import pandas as pd

def entrance(df):
    window_size = 241
    rolling_mean = df['sea_level_0m'].rolling(window=window_size, center=True, min_periods=1).mean()
    df['pandas_l'] = rolling_mean
    df['pandas_h'] = df['sea_level_0m'] - rolling_mean
    return df
